DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the effects of Salvinorin A (SA). SA is the active ingredient of the plant Salvia divinorum that is known to have been used by Mexican Indians as part of religious rituals. The purpose of this project is to understand what people experience when they consume Salvinorin A.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Salvinorin A in Healthy Controls
DOC.criteria: Previous exposure to inhaled Salvinorin A (SA).
